## Git.create() method

Create a new bare repository `repoName` in the instance repository directory.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
create(repo: string, callback: (error?: Error) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  repo | string | the name of the repo |
|  callback | (error?: Error) => void | Optionally get a callback <code>cb(err)</code> to be notified when the repository was created. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
